LifeInLockdownS1M1P1.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P1 - Lockdown Birthday
LifeInLockdownS1M1P1.description: 2020-03-15 (22:49) - This was taken on the 15th March 2020 - shortly before the world locked-down. Our store was celebrating its birthday. (2 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P2.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P2 - Sunset in Peacehaven
LifeInLockdownS1M1P2.description: 2020-03-24 (18:50) - The overwhelming memory I'll have of doing pizza deliveries during the pandemic is the eerily empty roads, the skys devoid of contrails, the quiet, and my car being my little bubble that I float around in, seemingly unaware of the seizmic events underway. (100 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P3.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P3 - Excalibur
LifeInLockdownS1M1P3.description: 2020-04-04 (01:36) - Chilling out after work at Newhaven Harbour. (3 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P4.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P4 - Sanitiser
LifeInLockdownS1M1P4.description: 2020-04-04 (23:24) - I've been refilling this little bottle of hand sanitiser from the dispenser in the shop where I work. (10 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P5.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P5 - View from Peacehaven towards Saltdean
LifeInLockdownS1M1P5.description: 2020-04-16 (20:01) - Another favourite lookout spot to stop for a break during my shift - notable in all of these photos early in the pandemic is the complete lack of any planes in the sky. (2 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P6.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P6 - Peacehaven Promenade
LifeInLockdownS1M1P6.description: 2020-04-24 (19:52) - I'm so lucky that I get to be out on the road at sunset - and delivering pizzas through the pandemic gave me almost exclusive access to some of the best sunset locations. (100 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P7.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P7 - Looking across Denton
LifeInLockdownS1M1P7.description: 2020-05-07 (20:23) - I pulled over to take this on the way back from a delivery because the whole of Newhaven was lit up with this beautiful sunset. (1 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P8.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P8 - Looking across Denton (Landscape)
LifeInLockdownS1M1P8.description: 2020-05-07 (20:23) - Another angle from the same time and location as S1M1P7 (100 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P9.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P9 - My car outside the pizza shop
LifeInLockdownS1M1P9.description: 2020-05-13 (20:15) - This is my car parked up outside the pizza place where I worked during the pandemic - for anyone who knows the area, you'd be very surprised that there's not a long queue of traffic heading home from work from Brighton (3 Minted)

LifeInLockdownS1M1P10.name: LifeInLockdownS1M1P10 - Upturned shopping trolley in the supermarket car park
LifeInLockdownS1M1P10.description: 2020-04-07 (22:28) - There's a rather eerie feeling of being in a supermarket car park with random upturned trollies and hazard tape all over the car park (1 Minted)
